description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Michael T. Nygard - Author of "Release It!"

ABSTRACT
Once you hit Release 1.0, your system will be living in the real world. It has to survive everything the messy, noisy real world can throw at it: from flash mobs to Twitter. Once the public starts [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
